de.japi.components

Class Japi2SevenSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • de.japi.components.AbstractDrawable
            • de.japi.components.AbstractJapi2ValueComponent
              • de.japi.components.Japi2SevenSegment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class Japi2SevenSegment
extends AbstractJapi2ValueComponent
    Seven-segment display component for SWING. This component displays a single seven-segment "character". Values are set through setValue(int) and range from 0 (0x0) to 15 (0xf).

    This component supports optimized rendering. See AbstractJapi2ValueComponent for more information. Once optimized rendering is enabled, this component is drawn with anti-alias and a slightly sheared to match real seven-segement displays.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
